name: Suzanne Glover
what_you_do: Suzanne teaches business owners, CEOs, speakers and successful entrepreneurs how to become more influential and successful on video, scale their business with automation and have an edge over their competitors in video marketing.
who_you_serve: Business owners, CEOs, speakers and successful entrepreneurs
social_proof: As seen on various media outlets
business_focus: Helping entrepreneurs scale their business through video marketing and automation
service_provided: Video marketing, business automation, video influencing
